result.execSummary:
The defendant Mychael J. WADE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Under the Huber Law, commencing immediately.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mychael J. WADE

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Request and Response Re: Copies for Kettle Moraine Correctional Institution sent via electronic document exchange 9/12/2016.

Defendant in custody on another matter.
GUILTY plea entered to the charge of failure to report to jail.  Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for thirty (30) days, under the Huber Law, commencing immediately.
Court costs are waived.
Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.
Minutes.

Plea Hearing scheduled for 04-22-2014 @ 2:30 p.m.
rescheduled from 04-24-2014.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 04-21-14 at 10:00 a.m.
Plea date is set for 04-24-14 at 10:30 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 03-18-14 at 2:30 p.m.  
Minutes.
RE:  Fail to report to jail, on 02-13-14.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of fail to report to jail.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 03-10-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release.   Bail furnished and defendant is remanded into custody serving a sentence until 07-10-14.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
